name: Intro to Musicology
description: This course covers the fundamentals of Musicology, such as the history of music, the basic elements of music, and the different genres of music.

name: Music Theory
description: This course covers the fundamentals of music theory, such as scales, chords, rhythm, and harmonic structure.

name: Music History
description: This course covers the history of music from antiquity to the present day, including the development of music in different cultures and the evolution of musical styles.

name: Composition
description: This course covers the fundamentals of composition, including the basics of structure, melody, harmony, and instrumentation.

name: Performance
description: This course covers the fundamentals of performance, including techniques for playing various instruments and vocal performance.

name: Music Analysis
description: This course covers the techniques of music analysis, including the methods of formal analysis, Schenkerian analysis, and set theory.

name: Music Criticism
description: This course covers the fundamentals of music criticism, including the techniques of literary and historical analysis of music.
